El's Drive-In http://www.dexknows.com/business_profiles/el_s_drive_in-b72162/ (252) 648-7161 3706 Arendell St , Morehead City , NC 28557 34.7249033 -76.7568998 Home of the original superburger since 1959. Send to Phone Email Business View On facebook
Hours
mon 10:30am - 10:00pm tues 10:30am - 10:00pm wed 10:30am - 10:00pm thurs 10:30am - 10:00pm fri 10:30am - 11:00pm sat 10:30am - 11:00pm sun 10:30am - 10:00pm
closed Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve and Christmas Day
Description
View Gallery Welcome to EL's Drive-In! We can't wait to serve you a delicious meal!
El's Drive-In is a family owned, fast food restaurant located in Morehead City, NC. We are next door to Carteret General Hospital and across the street from Carteret Community College and the Crystal Coast Civic Center. We have been serving the freshest meals since 1959. All food is made to order, delivered to your car by a curbside waitress, or if you prefer, at one of our picnic tables nestled under the oak trees.… Read More> Welcome to EL's Drive-In! We can't wait to serve you a delicious meal!
El's Drive-In is a family owned, fast food restaurant located in Morehead City, NC. We are next door to Carteret General Hospital and across the street from Carteret Community College and the Crystal Coast Civic Center. We have been serving the freshest meals since 1959. All food is made to order, delivered to your car by a curbside waitress, or if you prefer, at one of our picnic tables nestled under the oak trees. Please allow cooking time, especially during lunches, weekends and holidays. We'd love to know you if found us on the web...so let your waitress know! We can't wait to meet you and have you join thousands of satisfied customers!
El's Drive-In is a favorite spot for get-togethers, high school reunions, homecomings and even wedding parties.
EL's Drive-In Menu Includes:
* Hot Dogs * Cheese Dogs * Steak Sandwich * Hamburger * Cheeseburger * The Famous Superburger * The Famous Super Cheeseburger * Barbeque * Super BBQ * Pizza Burger * Fried Chicken (allow 20 min. cooking time) * Chicken Nuggets * Shrimpburger * Oysterburger * Ham Sandwiches * Bacon&Egg Sandwiches * Grilled Cheese
Side Orders Include:
* Fries (can add cheese, chili or both) * Slaw (freshly made from our own recipe! It's the Best around!) * Hushpuppies * Onion Rings
Call in orders are welcome and appreciated. Please allow cooking time, especially during lunches, weekends and holidays.
Call today for the freshest food and quality service.
* We also accept Money Orders! Categories: Restaurants <Read Less Write a Review Reviews Simply the Best!! by Food Fanantic - 06/14/2010
By my own standards, the shrimp burger was to die for. Only wish I had thought to order additional ones to bring home with me. My soulmate introduced me to this place after a couple days at Atlantic Beach, oh my goodness, what… Read More> By my own standards, the shrimp burger was to die for. Only wish I had thought to order additional ones to bring home with me. My soulmate introduced me to this place after a couple days at Atlantic Beach, oh my goodness, what a deal, what a meal. Can't wait to return and bring home the goodies to enjoy at later date. <Read Less
Another life time eater by Carl-Patriot 75 - 05/16/2010
Also born in the old Hospital, and stop in to El's every trip. Living in the Raleigh area now, but any excuse to go to Morehead always includes a stop in to pick up a meal to eat there, and burgers to bring back. Mr. Barts is… Read More> Also born in the old Hospital, and stop in to El's every trip. Living in the Raleigh area now, but any excuse to go to Morehead always includes a stop in to pick up a meal to eat there, and burgers to bring back. Mr. Barts is right, heated up El's is better than any other fresh burger I know. When I was stationed in California, my mother wold bring a dozen frozen superburgers to us. Talk about good eatin in Cali. They lasted for 6 days. <Read Less
best super burger by tim barts - 05/10/2010
I was born in Morehead at the old Morehead hospital. You can bet when I come back home to see my sisters that my family and I have to stop to El's. I would rather eat there than the Sanitary or Captain Bills. My daughters (3) all… Read More> I was born in Morehead at the old Morehead hospital. You can bet when I come back home to see my sisters that my family and I have to stop to El's. I would rather eat there than the Sanitary or Captain Bills. My daughters (3) all were surprised the first time that we took them to El's. They all said What's this place?.... and we want to go to McDonald's. Not any more. my youngest daughter is 18 and she can not wait to take her new boyfriend to eat at El's. Yes we always take several burgers back with us. Warmup El's burgers are better than most any other burgers, <Read Less
